title: IDA LoadLibraryError
content:
I installed IDA Demo today, however I'm having a bit of trouble installing plugins. I'm trying to install a plugin called 'ClassInformer'. I followed all the instructions, editing the plugins.cfg file, copying the files to the plugin folder. However when I boot up IDA it gives me these errors:

LoadLibrary(C:\Program Files (x86)\IDA Demo 6.9\plugins\IDA_ClassInformer_PlugIn.pLW) error: The specified module could not be found.
C:\Program Files (x86)\IDA Demo 6.9\plugins\IDA_ClassInformer_PlugIn.pLW: can't load file

LoadLibrary(C:\Program Files (x86)\IDA Demo 6.9\plugins\IDA_ClassInformer_PlugIn.pLW) error: The specified module could not be found.
C:\Program Files (x86)\IDA Demo 6.9\plugins\IDA_ClassInformer_PlugIn.pLW: can't load file

However the files are in the correct folder so I don't know why they can't be found. Here's a picture of the children of the folder.

Folder Children

comments.text: I am not sure, but I think that the Demo does not allow plugins.
@tmr232 I am not sure. However when the analysis is done, if I try to run the plugin it works fine. So I'm not sure why its erroring out, but it seems to not have any trouble running.
This could also be related to compilation and binary incompatability instead
